item.name: User Sign Up
item.description: #### User can sign up from this request and then use his username and password in basic auth of collection to get authencticated

item.name: User CRUD

request.description: Get list of all registered user

item.description: **CRUD operations in USERs collection on Database**

request.description:
**This route is to upload csv file data to mongoDB database .**
			-- csv file must contain 4 columns 
|name|year|nomination|rating|release


some sample files are given in sample files folder
it is basically data of oscar winners which I used 

> Key value for file should be named as 'csv-file'

response.name: localhost:3000/upload
